body: Kinda a Melancholy hentai but very good.
So basically, y'all saying that they're a product of an incest relationship and if you think about it after reading this, it looks disturbing for some reason ;-;
Also, i have a theory that, they might be half sibling that lil sister was born from mom and her hubby, while big bro is surely born from mom and uncle(moms big bro)
Ir.jokowi aiiyoo pak pres, pa kabs? Seneng sama incest jg pak haha, degenerate nih pak pres kita
She got anemia because the sideeffect of incestbreed
153628 is the first part I suppose.

The ending is definitely a flashback of their mom and uncle from the first story. It's the exact same house in the wide shot. Also it seems like the uncle might've told their mom over the phone that the kids were fucking. Probably the reason why mom insisted that son stays behind. I'm assuming that's the same thing that happened to the mom and uncle when they were younger.

So, I'm pretty sure the ending is a flashback to the mom and uncle. The sister is shown to have a "twin pigtail" hairstyle in both chapters, but at the end, the girl has a single pony tail instead, which would indicate it's not the main girl. I think it's a flashback to when the uncle got the mom pregnant (anemia can be a symptom of pregnancy) with the MC.
Given the "replaced" tag the ending seems like she got a brand new onii-san to sneak about with.
I wonder whether this is a sequel or prequel...
Hmmm, could the last few pages be a flashback of the mom and uncle?
Yeah. This manga just let's you hope they're gonna get busted.  And I do. This will probably continue and they will get it for sure.
